Blog.post: to get back to bangalore..... get back home.... get back to friends

urlLink decided to start palying with the camera again.... i remembered seeing these cute weeds near amit's apartment.... i went there today n took a bunch of snaps...... 3 of them seemed ok... i have uploaded them in the "photlab" album (look at the "pictures" link on the right) i've started to love using a small depth of feild... so that only a small part of the picture is in focus and everything else is blurred..... no better way to highlight the subject

seem to be getting interested in too many things...... want to learn photography want to read software design (i'll be really happy when i actually complete a book!) want to write more software want to read a lot of articles/opnions on technology want to spend more time with friends want to make more new friends want to learn about movies n cinematography want present a tech paper naturally i was thinking that the biggest problem would be time........ strangely enuf, indecision has been the villian...... as soon as i get myself started one thing, i get tempted into doin somethin else...... and we all know the result..... another day wasted...... guess aruna was right when she said that the "c" in "karthik.c" stands for confused :-| well atleast i managed to put an entry in the blog.... guess thats a start :-)

urlLink finally got my camera delivered..... and it works....i bought it from ebay and it surely doesnt look new, but hey who cares :-) (i got it for 300 bucks less than the marked price). took this picture from the apartment parking lot urlLink

urlLink Just purchased the sony f828 online.... feeling very nervous abt it.... its the first time im purchasing something this expensive online. Cant wait to get it though...... Im sure it will be a hell lot of fun :-) urlLink
urlLink http://www.cybershotf828.com/

its my first weblog and i have no clue what i want to post here :-) anyway, heres a bit about me.... i work for urlLink thoughtworks , supposed to be around 23 yrs old, blessed with an awesome bunch of friends and have a wonderful family...... and yeah i cant spell a thing :-)

urlLink my bro vivek was here last weekend...... had a really good time with him and his friends... jayanth and ambi...... wow that was a nice n pleasant change .... started getting bored as soon as he left on sunday evening... we went to the 17 mile drive ( for the 3rd time :-| ) and saw .... rather slept thru.... bourne supremacy :-D

hey does anybody know how to add members to this blog?? i guess there should be someway we can post messages without signing in as unforgiven_blog each time.

just bought a new camera on e-bay this saturday...... still hasnt arrived yet. feeling pretty scared thinking about it, never bought anything this expensive online. i have been getting more and more interested/passionate in photography in the past one year..... so ended up buying a very high end camera.... a urlLink sony f828 .... dunno if its worth it.... but it surely does look cool :) cant wait till i get my hands on it :-) and also in other less interesting news.... i finally created my own weblog...... u can see it at urlLink http://cantspellathing.blogspot.com/ . had to come up with some wierd name like this, coz most of the usual names are already taken. but it speaks a lot about me :-D
